BridgeIt

Native Contact List Access

Access the device contact list with a simple line of JavaScript...

var callback = function(event){...};
function launchContactList(){
    bridgeit.fetchContact('myId', 
        callback);  
}

<a type="button"
    onclick="launchContactList();">
    Fetch a Contact</a>
Fetch a Contact
